text: Frederick Dierks Bentley (born November 20, 1975) is an American country music singer and songwriter. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Dierks Bentley (2003) * Modern Day Drifter (2005) * Long Trip Alone (2006) * Feel That Fire (2009) * Up on the Ridge (2010) * Home (2012) * Riser (2014) * Black (2016) * The Mountain (2018) * Gravel & Gold (2023) ==References== Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Country musicians from Arizona
title: Dierks Bentley
